channel.title: CVE Feed for Ghost Foundation -- Ghost
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ghost Foundation -- Ghost

item.title: CVE-2022-41654|2024-09-16T17:28:08.035Z -- ghost%20foundation -- ghost
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the newsletter subscription functionality of Ghost Foundation Ghost 5.9.4. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to increased privileges. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-34559|2024-08-02T02:59:21.841Z -- ghost%20foundation -- ghost
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Ghost Foundation Ghost.This issue affects Ghost: from n/a through 1.4.0.

item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Ghost Foundation Ghost.This issue affects Ghost: from n/a through 1.4.0.
